title: The ceremonies of the vacant see, or, A true relation of what passes at Rome upon the pope's death with the proceedings in the conclave, for the election of a new pope, according to the constitutions and ceremonials, as also the coronation and cavalcade / out of the French by J. Davies of Kidwelly.
author: Leti, Gregorio, 1630-1701.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by H.L. and R.B. for Tho. Basset,
